cookingTips: Make a thin slit along the inside curve of banana without cutting through peel; open gently like a boat
Pack chocolate chips and marshmallows tightly into banana pocket to prevent them from falling out
Wrap banana loosely in foil and heat at edge of fire, turning occasionally; chocolate will melt in 5-10 minutes
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the best way to position a banana-split packet over a campfire to ensure the chocolate melts without burning the banana skin?
